issue.title: [Rust] Add temporal builders for StructArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5188](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5188). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
StructBuilder currently doesn't have builders for temporal arrays.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5188?focusedCommentId=16822396) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4179
